author: Cortex XSOAR

automation.description: Find an email across all mailboxes, and return the list of mailboxes where the email was found, as well as Yes if the mail was found anywhere or No otherwise.
automation.name: MimecastFindEmail

commands.description: Returns Impersonation Protect logs for a Mimecast customer account.
commands.name: mimecast-get-impersonation-logs

commands.description: Returns the list of groups according to the specified query.
commands.name: mimecast-find-groups

commands.description: List all existing Mimecast blocked sender policies.
commands.name: mimecast-list-blocked-sender-policies

commands.description: Get the contents or metadata of a given message. This is an archive search command.
commands.name: mimecast-get-message

commands.description: Returns URL protect logs for a Mimecast customer account. Default value of scanResult as malicious.
commands.name: mimecast-get-url-logs

commands.description: Removes a user from a group. The email_address and domain_address arguments are optional, but one of them must be supplied.
commands.name: mimecast-remove-group-member

commands.description: Get information about held messages, including the reason, hold level, sender and recipients.
commands.name: mimecast-list-held-message

commands.description: Create a managed URL on Mimecast.
commands.name: mimecast-create-managed-url

commands.description: Release a currently held message.
commands.name: mimecast-release-held-message

commands.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific message.
commands.name: mimecast-get-message-info

commands.description: Adds a user to a group. The email_address and domain_address arguments are optional, but one of them must be supplied.
commands.name: mimecast-add-group-member

commands.description: Returns the members list for the specified group.
commands.name: mimecast-get-group-members

commands.description: Get a blocked sender policy by ID.
commands.name: mimecast-get-policy

commands.description: Get the count of the inbound and outbound email queues at specified times.
commands.name: mimecast-list-email-queues

commands.description: Reject a currently held message.
commands.name: mimecast-reject-held-message

commands.description: Query Mimecast emails. This is an archive search command.
commands.name: mimecast-query

commands.description: Updates the specified policy.
commands.name: mimecast-update-policy

commands.description: Get counts of currently held messages for each hold reason.
commands.name: mimecast-held-message-summary

commands.description: Create a Blocked Sender Policy.
commands.name: mimecast-create-policy

commands.description: Decodes a given url from mimecast.
commands.name: mimecast-url-decode

commands.description: Updates an existing Mimecast group.
commands.name: mimecast-update-group

commands.description: Permit or block a specific sender.
commands.name: mimecast-manage-sender

commands.description: Get a list of all managed URLs.
commands.name: mimecast-list-managed-url

commands.description: Searches a message.
commands.name: mimecast-search-message

commands.description: Login to generate Access Key and  Secret Key.
commands.name: mimecast-login

commands.description: Download attachments from a specified message. This is an archive search command.
commands.name: mimecast-download-attachments

commands.description: Delete a Blocked Sender Policy.
commands.name: mimecast-delete-policy

commands.description: Creates a new Mimecast group.
commands.name: mimecast-create-group

commands.description: Get a list of messages for a given user. This is an archive search command.
commands.name: mimecast-list-messages

commands.description: Returns a Mimecast remediation incident.
commands.name: mimecast-get-remediation-incident

commands.description: discover authentication types that are supported for your account and which base URL to use for the requesting user.
commands.name: mimecast-discover

commands.description: Return messages currently being processed by Mimecast. Note that most of the time, no results are returned.
commands.name: mimecast-search-processing-message

commands.description: Refresh access key validity.
commands.name: mimecast-refresh-token

commands.description: Creates a new Mimecast remediation incident.
commands.name: mimecast-create-remediation-incident

commands.description: Returns Attachment Protect logs for a Mimecast customer account.
commands.name: mimecast-get-attachment-logs

commands.description: Searches for one or more file hashes in the account. Maximum is 100.
commands.name: mimecast-search-file-hash

integration.description: Mimecast unified email management offers cloud email services for email security, continuity and archiving emails. Please read detailed instructions in order to understand how to set the integration's parameters.
integration.name: Mimecast v2

playbook.description: This playbook retrieves a specified EML/MSG file directly from Mimecast.
playbook.name: Get Email From Email Gateway - Mimecast

playbook.description: A playbook to block sender domain name using Mimecast integration.
playbook.name: Mimecast - Block Sender Domain

playbook.description: A playbook to block sender email address using Mimecast integration.
playbook.name: Mimecast - Block Sender Email

description: Mimecast unified email management offers cloud email services for email security, continuity and archiving emails. Read the detailed instructions to understand how to configure the integration's parameters.
name: Mimecast
readme: Note: The supported time format is yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss+|-nnnn (2021-12-08T10:00:00-0400). The relevant fields are "datetime" or "eventTime"
